Specific Access Issues
Courseinfo
Low vision
2002
blackboard not keyboard operable
browser buttons not read by JAWS (submit a file) 
confusion over different layout of Calendar screen
no validity checking for quiz. accidental submit possible
poorly labeled quiz form fields difficult to interpret

LD

Mobility
